dt-example.title: Basic StateRestore Example
dt-example.info:
This is the `-init stateRestore` extension for DataTables.
It allows DataTables states to be stored and restored at any point. Pressing the `Create State` button will create a new state. This can then be accessed under the `Saved States` button. Here the state can be loaded into the table, updated, removed or renamed.
There is no limit on the number of states that can be stored within StateRestore.
